About.title: About Pilates Smederevo
About.description: Pilates Smederevo is a premium Pilates studio dedicated to helping you achieve your fitness goals through mindful movement and expert instruction.

philosophy.title: Mind-Body Connection
philosophy.desc: We believe in strengthening the connection between mind and body for overall wellness and improved quality of life.

philosophy.title: Personalized Approach
philosophy.desc: Every body is different, which is why we tailor our instruction to meet your unique needs and goals.

philosophy.title: Supportive Community
philosophy.desc: We foster a welcoming environment where members feel supported and inspired to achieve their best.

trainersList.name: Biljana Zivkovic
trainersList.bio: Biljana has been teaching Pilates for over 10 years and is certified in mat Pilates. She specializes in using equipment to enhance the traditional Pilates experience for all fitness levels.

trainersList.name: Aleksandra Sikirica
trainersList.bio: Aleksandra brings her background in dance and physical therapy to create dynamic and mindful Pilates sequences that focus on building core strength and flexibility.

trainersList.name: Andjela Pavic
trainersList.bio: Andjela is our Pilates expert with extensive knowledge in using equipment for traditional Pilates.

trainersList.name: Bojana Milic
trainersList.bio: Bojana is our Pilates instructor with experience for all fitness levels.

studio.title: State-of-the-Art Equipment
studio.desc: Our studio features premium Pilates towers, chairs, and other specialized equipment to enhance your practice.

studio.title: Tranquil Environment
studio.desc: Designed with serenity in mind, our space provides the perfect atmosphere for focusing on your practice and wellness journey.

story: Founded in 2018, Pilates Smederevo began with a simple mission: to create a space where people of all fitness levels could experience the transformative power of Pilates in a supportive, non-intimidating environment.

What started as a small studio with fewer equipment has grown into a thriving community dedicated to mindful movement and holistic wellness. Our instructors bring diverse backgrounds in dance, physical therapy, and athletics to create a unique approach to Pilates that honors traditional methods while embracing innovation.

Today, Pilates Smederevo continues to evolve, but our core values remain the same: attention to proper form, personalized instruction, and a commitment to helping each client discover their strongest self.

questions.question: Do I need to bring my own equipment?
questions.answer: No, we provide all the necessary equipment for our classes. Just bring comfortable clothing, water, and a positive attitude!

questions.question: How do I book a class?
questions.answer: You can book classes through our online booking system, mobile app, or by calling our studio directly. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance as classes tend to fill up quickly.

questions.question: What's your cancellation policy?
questions.answer: We require a 12-hour notice for class cancellations to avoid being charged. For private sessions, we require a 24-hour notice.

questions.question: Is Pilates suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Pilates is adaptable to all fitness levels. We offer specific beginner classes and our instructors can modify exercises to suit your needs and experience level.
